org.treetank.node.interfaces

Interface IStructNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    INode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocumentRootNode, ElementNode, StructNodeDelegate, TextNode

    public interface IStructNode
extends INode
    Class to denote that an INode has structural attributes. That means that a class can have pointers to neighbours.
